thread.title: Future Joins Maroon 5 for New Song “Cold”: Listen | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Future Joins Maroon 5 for New Song “Cold”: Listen | Pitchfork

title: Future Joins Maroon 5 for New Song “Cold”: Listen | Pitchfork
text:
Future Joins Maroon 5 for New Song “Cold”: Listen Maroon 5 (Michael Tran/FilmMagic); Future (Prince Williams/ Wireimage) 
Maroon 5 have teamed with Future for their latest single, “Cold.” Listen below. The song follows their Kendrick Lamar collaboration “ Don’t Wanna Know ,” which was accompanied by a “Pokémon Go”-themed music video . Maroon 5’s last album was 2014’s V. Future most recently released the Free Bricks 2: Zone 6 Edition mixtape with Gucci Mane. 
Revisit Pitchfork’s Update interview with Future. Artists In This Story
